title: More than just sweet: current insights into microplastics in honey products and a case study of Melipona quadrifasciata honey
content:
Environ. Sci.: Processes Impacts, 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4EM00262H, Paper
Bárbara Rani-Borges, Mariana Victorino Nicolosi Arena, Ingrid Naiara Gomes, Luís Henrique França de Carvalho Lins, Livia de Souza Camargo Cestaro, Marcelo Pompêo, Rômulo Augusto Ando, Isabel Alves-dos-Santos, Rogério Hartung Toppa, Marcos Roberto Martines, Lucas Gonçalves Queiroz
The presence of microplastics in honey samples from a native Brazilian bee varied from 0.1 to 2.6 particles per mL across urban and vegetated areas.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
